metadata.title: CVE-2020-28020 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.92 allows Integer Overflow to Buffer Overflow, in which an unauthenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary code by leveraging the mishandling of continuation lines during header-length restriction.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1').
